member.name: M:WebServerApp.AdultsController.GetAdultsAsync
member.summary: Returns a list of all adults.
member.returns: An IList of Adults, embedded within a Task, with ActionResult subtype
member.response: Returns the item with an OK HTTP response code.
Returns a status code 500, Internal Server Error.

member.name: M:WebServerApp.Controllers.UsersController.ValidateUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method validates users from the server, enabling more actions.
member.param: The username of the user, sent in the query.
The password of the user, sent in the query.
member.returns: An User, embedded in a Task, with the subtype ActionResult.
